name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dynamic Senior Engineer, I bring 8 years of comprehensive experience emphasizing high-performance solutions in engineering domains. My core competencies include proficiency in **AutoCAD** for 3D modeling and detailed simulations, alongside expertise in **load calculation**, **rigging**, and **lifting plans**. I have successfully managed projects that require precise **FEA** and developed intricate **load charts** to ensure compliance with safety standards. 
Beyond my technical acumen, I excel in project leadership and team collaboration, ensuring seamless execution of engineering tasks. I possess a solid foundation in **MS Office** for effective documentation and reporting. My analytical skills enable me to develop innovative solutions that enhance operational efficiency while adhering to industry regulations.
